{"step_by_step_thinking": "Endometriotic lesions are a characteristic of endometriosis, a condition where tissue similar to the lining of the uterus is found outside the uterus. Histology is the study of the microscopic structure of tissues. Therefore, histology would not represent hormonal levels such as estrogen, insulin, prolactin, or cholesterol.
